Typedef Documentation

typedef struct client_config_coll_s client_config_coll_t

It contains the configuration for the client if (profile == NULL) the configuration must be loaded else the configuration has already been loaded

Function Documentation

int client_config ( client_config_coll_t *  ccc,
int  global_config 
)

Load configuration from environment vars and XML files

Parameters
[out]ccc: the object that will contain the client configuration
[in]global_config: TRUE if "ccc" is a global static object (just one for all the threads of the process) , FALSE if "ccc" is a local dynamic object (every thread has its own). TX API uses a global static config shared by all the threads, XTA API uses a local dynamic object for every thread.
Returns
a reason code

Referenced by xta_transaction_manager_new().

void client_config_append_rsrmgr ( client_config_coll_t *  ccc,
const struct rsrmgr_config_s *  rsrmgr,
const struct act_rsrmgr_config_s *  act_rsrmgr 
)

Append a resource manager to the list of actual resource managers

Parameters
[in,out]ccc: client config collection object
[in]rsrmgr: describes the resource manager that must be appended (it can be NULL)
[in]act_rsrmgr: that describes the actual resource manager that must be appended (it can be NULL)

Referenced by xta_transaction_enlist_resource().

Parameters

Returns

int client_config_load_switch_file ( struct act_rsrmgr_config_s *  act_rsrmgr,
int  dynamically_defined 
)

Load the switch file related to a Resource Manager

Parameters
[in,out]act_rsrmgr: properties of a resource manager
[in]dynamically_defined: TRUE if the configuration has been dynamically defined by the Application Program using XTA interface; FALSE if the configuration has been statically defined inside the lixac.conf file
Returns
a reason code

Referenced by xta_native_xa_resource_init().

int client_config_rsrmgr_dup ( const struct act_rsrmgr_config_s *  arc,
struct rsrmgr_config_s *  rsrmgr,
struct act_rsrmgr_config_s *  act_rsrmgr 
)

Duplicate all the allocated objects connected to an ACTual ReSouRceManaGeR config struct

Parameters
[in]arc: the object that must be duplicated
[out]rsrmgr: the pointer to a pre-allocated space that will be used to store the duplicate of the resource manager config referenced by the first argument (arc). Use NULL if it should not be duplicated
[out]act_rsrmgr: the pointer to a pre-allocated space that will be used to store the duplicate of the actual resource manager config referenced by the first argument (arc). Use NULL if it should not be duplicated
Returns
a reason code

Referenced by xta_transaction_enlist_resource().

gchar* client_config_tostring_rsrmgr ( const struct act_rsrmgr_config_s *  arc)

Serialize the configuration of an actual resource manager to a string

Parameters
[in]arc: actual resource manager config
Returns
a string that must be freed with g_free() after usage

int client_unconfig ( client_config_coll_t *  ccc,
int  global_config 
)

Unload configuration and release memory

Parameters
[out]ccc: the object that contains the client configuration
[in]global_config: TRUE if "ccc" is a global static object (just one for all the threads of the process) , FALSE if "ccc" is a local dynamic object (every thread has its own). TX API uses a global static config shared by all the threads, XTA API uses a local dynamic object for every thread.
Returns
a reason code
